thread.title: Geely's Daimler stake: Germany weighs tighter rules

title: Geely's Daimler stake: Germany weighs tighter rules
text:
Geely's Daimler stake: Germany weighs tighter rules 10:29pm IST - 01:40 
Germany will investigate whether to tighten the rules that govern when an investor needs to disclose a holding in a company after news that China's Geely purchased a $9 billion stake in Daimler surprised the market. Silvia Antonioli reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Germany will investigate whether to tighten the rules that govern when an investor needs to disclose a holding in a company after news that China's Geely purchased a $9 billion stake in Daimler surprised the market.
